short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Superimposes IMDb, Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic ratings onto Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wondered if there's an easier way to know if a show is worth watching on Netflix besides googling for reviews manually? NetflixRatings is your shortcut to finding top-rated shows and movies (and avoid time wasters) on Netflix. 

Our app searches the top 3 review sites, and color-codes the shows depending on their ratings so you can know if a show is worth watching at a glance. On hover, we also allow you to navigate to the critic sites to read the reviews of the shows easily. 

Say goodbye to endless scrolling and hello to your next binge-worthy favorite with NetflixRatings!
